name: Halloween Decoration Sandbox
description:
The Halloween Decoration Sandbox is a creative open world game that lets users design their own home haunts. Pick from a wide selection of decorations to create the perfect experience which can be explored in VR as you collect candies by trick or treating.



  • Modify terrain in an open world sandbox map editor.
  • Place scenery around the world.
  • Add Halloween decorations to the sandbox.
  • Walk around with your character trick or treating collecting candy throughout the sandbox.

Decorate Your Sandbox!


Explore In Open World!
